main.name: Aleksandra Bystranowska Takahashi
main.description: Extremely organized, outdoors - loving, (probably) the biggest fan of Harry Potter.  “Anyone can speak Troll. All you have to do is point and grunt”. I have a heart for ReactJs and a belly for Polish pierogi
main.bio: A detail-oriented and enthusiastic software engineer with experience in full stack development. With education in psychology of management, I am passionate about applying my technical skills to create impactful projects to make change. I continuously focus on self-improvement and pride myself in being agile, organized and thriving in a team environment.
main.contactmessage: Suave Young Developer Looking for Work. I wonder who might be hiring. Perhaps you?

testimonials.text: A code is like love, it has created with clear intentions at the beginning, but it can get complicated.
You might not think that programmers are artists, but programming is an extremely creative profession. It's logic-based creativity.
